The Catholic Church needs to change in some ways. Many people are leaving the Catholic Church because it does not accept many things. The Church has strong views on issues like gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. But these views are old-fashioned in some ways. If the Church changed its thinking a little, it would not lose so many followers.

Some people are against the Catholic Church because of its views on these issues. They think the Church is wrong. The Church does not permit abortion, so people who support abortion may not want to be a part of it. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in gay marriage, you may not want to be in a group that says it is wrong.

The Catholic Church should allow women to be priests and priests to be married. But this might not have stopped bad things from happening. It is hard to know for sure.

Priests are said to be married to God. They are supposed to dedicate their lives to God. But other people work and have families, too. They have two lives. Priests should be able to have both.

I am with gay marriage. I do not think it is right to tell people they can't get married because of their sex. 

I believe people are born with their sexual orientation. It's not a choice they make. We are all different. Some people are born straight, and some people are born gay. It's not something they can control.

I think it's not fair to say that gay people made a wrong decision. They should not be punished for who they are. The federal government should not get involved in this issue. It's not a matter of national security or morals. It's just about people being happy and being who they are.

Everyone should have the right to get married. It's not fair to say no to people because of their sex. We should respect people's differences and not try to change them.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. There is no good reason not to. Many people think homosexuals threaten the traditional family. But that is not true. It is a different kind of relationship.

Gay couples are not the same as straight couples. But they are similar in many ways. They have the same kinds of relationships and the same goals.

One problem is that gay couples cannot get married in their community. They cannot be with their partner when they are sick or in the hospital. This is not fair. They should be able to have the same rights as everyone else.

Many studies have been done on gay couples. They have the same success rates as straight couples. They have the same things that make relationships successful.

Gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They are asking for a marriage certificate from the government. If the government allows them a civil union, why not a marriage?

Separate but equal is not fair. We should be equal. Gay couples have the same problems as straight couples. They have the same kinds of relationships and the same issues.

Some people worry about adoption and children. But children from gay couples are the same as children from straight couples. They need love and a home.

In New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents. They go to those schools because they get bullied in public schools. This is not right.

Parents who are gay are the same as parents who are straight. They love their children and want the best for them.

The government should help make gay marriage legal in all states. The law should be fair for everyone.

But President Bush has strong feelings about this. He believes it is against his religion. But the government should not make laws based on one person's beliefs. We should be fair to everyone.

Some people think gay people are damaged or have a personality problem. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says this is not true. We should listen to experts, not just what people think.

We should be fair and equal for everyone. Gay marriage should be allowed.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. Many people think that just because a medicine is not allowed, it cannot be good. I do not agree. If a medicine is not allowed, it does not mean it has no good qualities. I think it should not be available for the public to use. But for medical use, I think it is okay.

There are many medicines that are not allowed, but we use them in pharmacies. They have good qualities. Oxycotton, Vicodin, and Perocets are examples. They are controlled substances, but we use them because they are helpful. I do not think marijuana should be treated differently just because there is a negative image around it.

Marijuana and alcohol are not the same. If you use marijuana a lot, it can be a problem. But so can alcohol. It is a difficult issue. I think we should allow marijuana, but we should not do it suddenly. We should add it to the list of allowed medicines gradually. This way, people will not use it too much.

People have a bad image of marijuana because it is not allowed. But it is not as bad as other medicines like heroin or cocaine. If we remove the bad image, people might use it responsibly.

I think the church has changed to fit the 21st century. It is not as strict now as it used to be. I grew up going to church every Sunday. I wore nice dresses and matching shoes and a purse. This was a tradition for me.

I went to a private school and saw my friends at church on weekends. Now, the church has made a shorter service for teenagers called a "teenager mass." It lasts only 30 minutes. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They wear beach clothes. Even for morning masses, where I used to dress up, people now wear jeans and khakis.

I think the biggest change I have noticed is this more casual atmosphere. I do not know much about the church's politics. But I think this is how I see the church now.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests, I do not think allowing them to marry or have women priests would have prevented pedophilia. There are married men who are still pedophiles. Their attraction to young children is not because they are allowed to marry or not marry. It is a person's choice to become a priest. Some religions allow priests to marry, like the Seventh Heaven church.

I think people are born with their sexuality, and it is not their decision to choose. I do not think the church could have prevented these problems. If they knew about the problems and tried to hide them, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew about everything.

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was originally okay with the idea. But after the September 11th attacks, I think the US went to war in Iraq for the wrong reasons. The Bush administration linked the war to Osama Bin Laden and Saddam Hussein's weapons of mass destruction. But this was not true.

The Bush administration made a big mistake by lying to the American people. Colin Powell, the former secretary of state, said later that he was not sure about the evidence when he talked to the United Nations. This is not good for a leader. It is wrong to lie to the people.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution. They have tried to limit its power since September 11th. I believe the younger Bush wanted to go to war with Iraq. He wanted to take control of their oil.

The US has been in Iraq too long. If we leave now, there could be more fighting and more deaths. But I also do not think it is right to stay. The US is working with other countries in the region to bring order to Iraq. But I am not sure this will work. Iraq's government is weak, and there are many groups fighting for power.

The US used to be in charge, but now the Iraqi government has some control. But the parliament is not working well. The prime minister does not have much power. There are many groups fighting for control, and this is causing big problems.

I do not have a clear answer to this problem. It is very complicated.

I have thoughts about the War in Iraq. At first, I think it's pointless. The war was not declared by the U.S. Congress. I believe the reason we went to war was because Iraq was blamed for the September 11 attacks. But I do not think it's a big issue that I keep up with.

I know that the U.S. is trying to build democracy in Iraq so it can be like the U.S. But this takes a long time. We also want to get oil from Iraq. However, staying there makes people unhappy. If we stay, we have to try and create democracy, but this will take a long time.

If we leave, people in Iraq will be angry with us because we caused problems and now they have to start over. It's a hard decision.

I think the war should continue, but it's not a real war because Congress did not declare it. We use guns to show we are a strong country. I think we should help Iraq, but it's also wasting our resources.

It's hard for me to say I want the war to end because I know families in the U.S. have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to be safe. But if we stay in Iraq, we will try to change them into a second United States, and it will be hard for them.

The war is also making people hate the U.S. more. Iraq has a different culture than the U.S. If we try to change them, it will be worse for them. I think the war will go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right for a government to make something legal. The constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not decide what the church can and cannot do. The government should not try to control the church.

If the government tries to make a law about this, it will be unfair to other churches. Most Catholics and Christians do not support this. They do not think it is right. Only some people in certain areas agree.

I do not think the government should make a law about the church. The constitution already says there should be separation of church and state. This allows for religious freedom in the United States. Making a new law would be wrong and go against what is already written.

I also think that if the government makes a law like this, it will be the only law that limits people's freedom, not the government's. This is not fair. The government should not try to control what people believe.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The president is pushing for this law because of his own personal feelings as a Catholic. He wants to control what people believe. But this is not fair. It is up to the church, not the government, to decide what is right and wrong.

There is no good reason for this law. It will not help the economy. It might even make things better in society. The government should not try to control people's beliefs.

I have said my opinion.

The war in Iraq 
I don't think the government was honest with the American people about why we went to war. 
The government linked the invasion of Iraq to the 9/11 attacks. But they were not really connected. 
The government used this to make the American people angry and support the war. 
The war started in 2003. 

I am against war. 
I think a preemptive strike is not a good idea. 
The war in Iraq is similar to the Vietnam War. 
The government should have learned from past mistakes. 
Many American soldiers have died in the war. 
It is terrible. 
The US government removed the Iraqi government. 
But they were not prepared for what happened next. 
They took away the country's leadership and caused chaos. 
The US tried to create a democratic government in Iraq. 
But this is a hard thing to do. 
It took a long time to create a democratic government in the US. 

The US government should have planned for all possible outcomes. 
They were not prepared for what happened after they removed the Iraqi government. 
Many American soldiers are still in Iraq. 
They are trying to train the Iraqi army and police. 
This is a slow process. 
The US government made the American people think it would be a quick and easy victory. 
But it is not that simple. 

It is a difficult decision to make. 
I was thinking about this during the 2004 presidential election. 
One of my reasons for voting for George Bush was to finish what he started. 
But now it's hard to leave Iraq. 
We took away their government and way of life. 
We should try to finish the job, but we must also think about the American casualties. 
Is it worth it to keep risking American lives for a free Iraq? 
The reason we invaded Iraq was to make it a democracy. 
But we don't do this to all countries. 
The main reason is the oil. 
We want the oil. 
Another reason was that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but we didn't find any. 
We know North Korea has these weapons, but we are not attacking them. 
I don't think the US government is honest in its decisions. 

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq. 
But I don't think it will be easy.

I support gay marriage. I have always believed in it. I think it is a personal preference. Many studies show that being gay may be a natural part of a person's biology, not something they choose. This makes it unfair to deny them equal rights. I think it is inhumane to treat people unfairly because of something they cannot control.

I do not think the government should decide who can get married. Marriage is a personal choice, not something for the government to decide. It is not just a state issue, but a personal issue. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married because they are not allowed to. But they live like any other family: they walk their dogs and go about their daily lives.

I think it is wrong for the government to try to decide what marriage means. It is like trying to play God. I do not think it is right to deny people their rights because of who they love.

Many studies show that being gay may be caused by a chemical in the brain. It is not something a person chooses, but something they are born with. For example, a person may be gay even if they grow up with sisters and no father. This shows that being gay is not a choice.

The only reason I can think of for not allowing gay marriage is that it is a public issue. But if a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it privately. But if two gay people want to get married, it becomes a public issue. I think marriage should be a private matter, not something for the government to decide.

I do not think anyone should be denied the right to get married because of who they love. I support gay marriage.

When you put something on the internet, it becomes public. Everyone can see it. It is not private. As an R.A., I have dealt with this situation before. 

If you put something on the internet, it can affect how people think of you. If you talk about violence or shootings, someone might take it seriously. You should not put that kind of information on the internet. It goes to the whole world. If you are friends with that person on social media, you might see it. 

The school cannot ignore something that appears to be a threat. They have to take action to keep everyone safe. They can't just let it sit there in case something bad happens. 

But it is hard to know what is real and what is just a joke. Some people might say things on the internet just to be funny. This happened at my school when someone overheard something and called the school. They looked at the person's Facebook and found some things that made them worry. 

When you put things on the internet, you can't control who sees them. If you don't want people to know something, don't put it online. You can't tell people what to think or take seriously. 

School officials should not be friends with students on social media. But if something is brought to their attention, they have to take it seriously. They can't monitor private conversations, but if it's brought to their attention, they have to act. 

It's the same thing if a teacher makes a fake account to friend students. They should not do that. I wouldn't friend my residents on social media because I don't want to see things that might get them in trouble.

I think the war has lasted too long. 
The original goal was good. We wanted to bring democracy to another country. 
But now, I think we have lost sight of that goal. 
We are not fighting for democracy anymore. 
We are fighting just to show we are powerful. 
This is not a good reason for war. 

The war started with a good purpose. We wanted to give democracy to a country without a fair government. 
That is a good reason for war. 
But over time, our reasons have changed. 
We are now fighting just to keep fighting. 
We do not want to leave without winning. 

The war has lasted for too long. 
It is time for the country to take care of its own government. 
We should stop the war and spend our money on our own problems. 
We have many problems in our own country, like poverty and bad roads. 
We should spend our money on these problems, not on war. 

We are spending billions of dollars on war. 
War should not be a long-term cost. 
We should spend our money on things like health care and schools. 
Now, we are spending money to hurt our own soldiers in a war we are losing. 

I think that is all I want to say.

I have a question. It was stopped because someone found the information online. They looked at a site called Myspace. If you put information on the internet, it's available for everyone to see. On Myspace, you have to be a member to see someone's profile. But if you accept someone as your "friend," they can see your information. So, you give them permission.

It's hard to know who can see your information, but when you put it on the internet, many people can see it. In my case, I think it's good that someone found the information. It helped prevent a life from being lost.

It's not fair to have one person check everyone's profiles all the time, but then it's unfair to only look at the bad kids. If someone is looking for information to prevent something bad from happening, it's okay. But if they're just looking for trouble, it's not right.

I don't have a Myspace, but I have a Facebook. I'm worried about people seeing things about me. There was a TV show about a man who got information easily. He got a girl's screen name and talked to her on instant messenger. It's not safe.

People can learn a lot about you from your Facebook or Myspace. They can see your photos, your classes, and your friends. I tried to limit what I put up, but it's hard. I want to stay in touch with my friends.

It's a tricky issue because you never know who can see your information. My roommate told me about a school that banned students from having Myspace. I'm not sure if that's right. How can school officials tell students what to do on the internet?

I want to talk about the Iraq War. It is a very complex issue. I feel like I am being hypocritical if I say certain things. I was against the war from the beginning, but now it's not as important as it used to be. Almost everyone agrees that it was a bad idea, except for the people in the administration.

We see this in polls from the United States, Iraq, and around the world. About 75 to 80 percent of the world's population thinks the war was a bad idea. 80 percent of Iraqi people and 70 percent of US troops think it was a bad idea and that we should leave within a year.

The war was a disaster from the start. Now, leaving will also be difficult. The problem is that there is a big cultural difference between the US and the Middle East. We want to bring democracy to Iraq, but it's not the right system for them. They might not want it.

We should think about the pros and cons before invading a country. We need to consider the problems that come with staying in Iraq. I don't agree with the administration's ideas for staying. I haven't heard a good reason to stay.

If we want to leave gradually, that's okay. But I don't see a reason to stay any longer than necessary. I read that 80 percent of Iraqis want us to leave within a year, and a quarter want us to leave now. If we ask them, they might know better than us.

If we leave and something goes wrong, we can say we were going to stay, but they wanted us to leave. If we leave now, we can help them later as the good guys. We'll be better off than where we are now.

I think gender discrimination is still an issue in the United States. It's not just about women, though. I think it also depends on the job you do. For example, women often have it harder because there's the idea of a "glass ceiling" where people may not want to work for a woman, even if she has the qualifications for a job. This is because of the way society has been for a long time. In many workplaces, women are not often in top positions. It's hard for women to get jobs that they're qualified for because of this.

It's not just women who face this problem, though. Men can too. For example, in the fashion industry, people may not take men seriously if they like fashion. They may think, "How can you know what fashion is if you're a man?" This is because men who like fashion are often expected to have a certain style, and if they don't fit that style, people may doubt their ability to understand fashion.

It's the same with men who stay at home to be with their children. People may look down on them because they think men should be the main breadwinners. But some men may want to be with their children and take care of them. It's not a big deal if the wife has a better-paying job. 

So, it's not just about gender. It's also about the kind of job you do and where you come from. For example, a person from a farm may not speak perfect English, but they may be very smart and able to run a company. However, other people may still judge them because of the way they speak.

It's hard to change these attitudes, but we're making progress. Women are becoming more accepted in business, and men are starting to stay at home to care for their children. This is good, but it's a slow process. We need to keep promoting equality and fairness so that everyone has a chance to succeed, no matter what their background is.

My understanding is that marijuana was not made legal. It was decriminalized. This means it is no longer a serious crime. Instead, people can be given a ticket, like a traffic ticket, and they do not have to be arrested and put in jail.

If someone is caught with marijuana and gets a ticket, this can affect their future. They may have trouble getting a job or in school. These problems do not go away just because marijuana is not a crime.

However, some people say it is expensive to arrest and jail people. It costs money to take them to court and to pay for a lawyer. This can be a problem for cities that do not have a lot of money. In some cities, people do not want to make marijuana not a crime, even if it would save them money.

But in some places, like Denver, people are more open-minded. They think it is a good idea to make marijuana not a crime. This can help the city have more money to spend on important things, like education and helping the homeless.

But there are also reasons why marijuana should not be everywhere. For example, it can be bad for driving and it is still not widely accepted in many places. If it were legal everywhere, it might seem strange to see people smoking it in public.

I am not sure how I would feel if marijuana were completely legal. Some people might think it would be okay to sell it in stores like cigarettes. But this could also mean that more people would drive and smoke it, which could be a problem. Many people still think it is wrong to smoke marijuana in public.

In general, I think marijuana can have bad effects on people's lives, not just their ability to drive. But people react differently to different substances, and some people are better at controlling how they use them.

So, it is hard to say how marijuana should be treated. I do think that both marijuana and alcohol can have bad effects.

I agree. 

Why? 

Many of the Catholic Church's practices are traditional. They have done things in the same way for a long time. It is good to respect tradition. But it is also important to be able to change.

Some Catholics believe they must go to church every week. They have strict rules about how things are done. Sometimes, I think the Catholic Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules exactly. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my parents are from different religions. My father is Episcopalian. My mother is Catholic. They could not get married in the Catholic Church because of my father's religion.

This is not being tolerant of other religions. We learn to love others in Catholic school. But it is hypocritical to say we love others and then not accept them.

I do not think allowing priests to marry would solve the problem of child abuse. People who abuse children will probably continue to do so, even if they are married. This is because they are hurting a child, not a spouse.

So, I do not think allowing priests to marry would be a good solution.

I am not sure about this issue. I have not thought about it deeply. I do not know if one side is right or wrong. 

This is a very difficult topic. We must be careful not to offend people. 

The idea of marriage is very important. But we also want to keep the church and government separate. It is hard to decide what marriage means without hurting anyone's feelings. 

I think marriage should be a civil union. Many people get tax breaks and special treatment if they are married. But we should not look at the kind of marriage it is. We should just know that two people are together. 

The idea of gay marriage is the same. Two people are together, and they should have the same rights. 

If many states agree, they should make it a federal law. But a constitutional amendment to ban gay marriage is not right. The constitution should not be changed for one big issue. It is not important enough. 

We should not change the constitution just to ban gay marriage. It is simple. 

No.

I grew up in a Christian home. For me, homosexuality is a complicated issue. I have many gay friends. I don't agree with all of their choices. But I think they should have the same rights as others. I don't think the president should decide for the whole country. Each state should decide for itself.

I believe that in democratic states, people usually support gay marriage. If you live in a state where they support it, you should respect their decision. You chose to live there, so you should accept their views.

I think homosexuals should have the same opportunities as others. So, each state should decide whether to make gay marriage legal or not.

I already answered this question. I don't think the president should make a decision for the whole country. I don't agree with President Bush's plan to ban gay marriage. He should not decide how each state should be run.

I think some things should be decided by individual states. The president will leave office soon. If a new president decides to change the law, it will just go back and forth. It's best to let each state decide for itself because they will live with the decision, not the president.

No, I don't think so.

The school system has the right to check student's Myspace pages. These pages are public, and students can post anything they want. School officials can see what students post, even if it's not under the school's name. They can still see it from their homes.

Schools have a responsibility to keep students safe. If they check Myspace to find students who are breaking the rules, that's okay. It helps keep the school safe. I think that's good.

Some people might think it's an invasion of privacy. But if it helps keep students safe, I don't think that's a bad thing. It's like when schools have lockdowns to keep students safe from danger. They are just trying to keep the school a safe place.

Students should know that anything they post online can be seen by others. They can't control who sees it. If they post something bad, they might get in trouble. This is why some students are careful about what they post online.

School officials are just trying to keep the school a safe place. They are not trying to be mean or hurt students. They just want to keep students safe from potential problems like school shootings.

This is why I think it's okay for school officials to check Myspace. They are just trying to help keep students safe.

I am not sure about the war.  At first, I thought it was a good idea.  I was affected by 9/11.  I wanted to go and help.  But I think we made a mistake.  We did not think about the future.  We went without a plan.  And then things did not go well.

I was for the war, but now I am against it.  I do not think it helped.  The people in the country we went to are fighting each other.  They cannot fight us if they are fighting themselves.  We went there because of 9/11.  But I do not care what happens to them now.

Sometimes I do not think they are human.  They fight a lot and cannot get along.  We did not know what to expect when we went there.  War is different for them than for us.  They are different in how they fight.  I do not think they want to make their country better.  They just want us to leave.

I think we were not thinking clearly.  We were angry and wanted revenge.  We wanted to change their way of life.  But we did not think about the consequences.  We just went there and wanted to leave quickly.

I think President Bush declared war on Iraq because people wanted to go to war.  He did not have a good plan.  We could not just let Iraq do bad things and then decide to rebuild.  But we could have had a better plan.

We did not have unity.  We did not know what we were doing.  That would have helped us.  We went to war with anger and emotion.  That is what we created in Iraq.

I do not think we can change those people.  They will always be like that.  We cannot stay in Iraq forever.  Once we leave, things will collapse.  We are hurting ourselves by staying.

The Catholic Church needs to change in some ways. Many people are leaving the Catholic Church because it does not accept many things. The Church has strong views on issues like gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. But these views are old-fashioned in some ways. If the Church changed its thinking a little, it would not lose so many followers.

Some people are against the Catholic Church because of its views on these issues. They think the Church is wrong. The Church does not permit abortion, so people who support abortion may not want to be a part of it. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in gay marriage, you may not want to be in a group that says it is wrong.

The Catholic Church should allow women to be priests and priests to be married. But this might not have stopped bad things from happening. It is hard to know for sure.

Priests are said to be married to God. They are supposed to dedicate their lives to God. But other people work and have families, too. They have two lives. Priests should be able to have both.

I am with gay marriage. I do not think it is right to tell people they can't get married because of their sex. 

I believe people are born with their sexual orientation. It's not a choice they make. We are all different. Some people are born straight, and some people are born gay. It's not something they can control.

I think it's not fair to say that gay people made a wrong decision. They should not be punished for who they are. The federal government should not get involved in this issue. It's not a matter of national security or morals. It's just about people being happy and being who they are.

Everyone should have the right to get married. It's not fair to say no to people because of their sex. We should respect people's differences and not try to change them.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. There is no good reason not to. Many people think homosexuals threaten the traditional family. But that is not true. It is a different kind of relationship.

Gay couples are not the same as straight couples. But they are similar in many ways. They have the same kinds of relationships and the same goals.

One problem is that gay couples cannot get married in their community. They cannot be with their partner when they are sick or in the hospital. This is not fair. They should be able to have the same rights as everyone else.

Many studies have been done on gay couples. They have the same success rates as straight couples. They have the same things that make relationships successful.

Gay couples are not asking to get married in a church. They are asking for a marriage certificate from the government. If the government allows them a civil union, why not a marriage?

Separate but equal is not fair. We should be equal. Gay couples have the same problems as straight couples. They have the same kinds of relationships and the same issues.

Some people worry about adoption and children. But children from gay couples are the same as children from straight couples. They need love and a home.

In New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents. They go to those schools because they get bullied in public schools. This is not right.

Parents who are gay are the same as parents who are straight. They love their children and want the best for them.

The government should help make gay marriage legal in all states. The law should be fair for everyone.

But President Bush has strong feelings about this. He believes it is against his religion. But the government should not make laws based on one person's beliefs. We should be fair to everyone.

Some people think gay people are damaged or have a personality problem. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says this is not true. We should listen to experts, not just what people think.

We should be fair and equal for everyone. Gay marriage should be allowed.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. Many people think that just because a medicine is not allowed, it cannot be good. I do not agree. If a medicine is not allowed, it does not mean it has no good qualities. I think it should not be available for the public to use. But for medical use, I think it is okay.

There are many medicines that are not allowed, but we use them in pharmacies. They have good qualities. Oxycotton, Vicodin, and Perocets are examples. They are controlled substances, but we use them because they are helpful. I do not think marijuana should be treated differently just because there is a negative image around it.

Marijuana and alcohol are not the same. If you use marijuana a lot, it can be a problem. But so can alcohol. It is a difficult issue. I think we should allow marijuana, but we should not do it suddenly. We should add it to the list of allowed medicines gradually. This way, people will not use it too much.

People have a bad image of marijuana because it is not allowed. But it is not as bad as other medicines like heroin or cocaine. If we remove the bad image, people might use it responsibly.

I think the church has changed to fit the 21st century. It is not as strict now as it used to be. I grew up going to church every Sunday. I wore nice dresses and matching shoes and a purse. This was a tradition for me.

I went to a private school and saw my friends at church on weekends. Now, the church has made a shorter service for teenagers called a "teenager mass." It lasts only 30 minutes. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They wear beach clothes. Even for morning masses, where I used to dress up, people now wear jeans and khakis.

I think the biggest change I have noticed is this more casual atmosphere. I do not know much about the church's politics. But I think this is how I see the church now.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests, I do not think allowing them to marry or have women priests would have prevented pedophilia. There are married men who are still pedophiles. Their attraction to young children is not because they are allowed to marry or not marry. It is a person's choice to become a priest. Some religions allow priests to marry, like the Seventh Heaven church.

I think people are born with their sexuality, and it is not their decision to choose. I do not think the church could have prevented these problems. If they knew about the problems and tried to hide them, that is wrong. But I do not think they knew about everything.

I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was originally okay with the idea. But after the September 11th attacks, I think the US went to war in Iraq for the wrong reasons. The Bush administration linked the war to Osama Bin Laden and Saddam Hussein's weapons of mass destruction. But this was not true.

The Bush administration made a big mistake by lying to the American people. Colin Powell, the former secretary of state, said later that he was not sure about the evidence when he talked to the United Nations. This is not good for a leader. It is wrong to lie to the people.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution. They have tried to limit its power since September 11th. I believe the younger Bush wanted to go to war with Iraq. He wanted to take control of their oil.

The US has been in Iraq too long. If we leave now, there could be more fighting and more deaths. But I also do not think it is right to stay. The US is working with other countries in the region to bring order to Iraq. But I am not sure this will work. Iraq's government is weak, and there are many groups fighting for power.

The US used to be in charge, but now the Iraqi government has some control. But the parliament is not working well. The prime minister does not have much power. There are many groups fighting for control, and this is causing big problems.

I do not have a clear answer to this problem. It is very complicated.

I have thoughts about the War in Iraq. At first, I think it's pointless. The war was not declared by the U.S. Congress. I believe the reason we went to war was because Iraq was blamed for the September 11 attacks. But I do not think it's a big issue that I keep up with.

I know that the U.S. is trying to build democracy in Iraq so it can be like the U.S. But this takes a long time. We also want to get oil from Iraq. However, staying there makes people unhappy. If we stay, we have to try and create democracy, but this will take a long time.

If we leave, people in Iraq will be angry with us because we caused problems and now they have to start over. It's a hard decision.

I think the war should continue, but it's not a real war because Congress did not declare it. We use guns to show we are a strong country. I think we should help Iraq, but it's also wasting our resources.

It's hard for me to say I want the war to end because I know families in the U.S. have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to be safe. But if we stay in Iraq, we will try to change them into a second United States, and it will be hard for them.

The war is also making people hate the U.S. more. Iraq has a different culture than the U.S. If we try to change them, it will be worse for them. I think the war will go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right for a government to make something legal. The constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not decide what the church can and cannot do. The government should not try to control the church.

If the government tries to make a law about this, it will be unfair to other churches. Most Catholics and Christians do not support this. They do not think it is right. Only some people in certain areas agree.

I do not think the government should make a law about the church. The constitution already says there should be separation of church and state. This allows for religious freedom in the United States. Making a new law would be wrong and go against what is already written.

I also think that if the government makes a law like this, it will be the only law that limits people's freedom, not the government's. This is not fair. The government should not try to control what people believe.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The president is pushing for this law because of his own personal feelings as a Catholic. He wants to control what people believe. But this is not fair. It is up to the church, not the government, to decide what is right and wrong.

There is no good reason for this law. It will not help the economy. It might even make things better in society. The government should not try to control people's beliefs.

I have said my opinion.

The war in Iraq 
I don't think the government was honest with the American people about why we went to war. 
The government linked the invasion of Iraq to the 9/11 attacks. But they were not really connected. 
The government used this to make the American people angry and support the war. 
The war started in 2003. 

I am against war. 
I think a preemptive strike is not a good idea. 
The war in Iraq is similar to the Vietnam War. 
The government should have learned from past mistakes. 
Many American soldiers have died in the war. 
It is terrible. 
The US government removed the Iraqi government. 
But they were not prepared for what happened next. 
They took away the country's leadership and caused chaos. 
The US tried to create a democratic government in Iraq. 
But this is a hard thing to do. 
It took a long time to create a democratic government in the US. 

The US government should have planned for all possible outcomes. 
They were not prepared for what happened after they removed the Iraqi government. 
Many American soldiers are still in Iraq. 
They are trying to train the Iraqi army and police. 
This is a slow process. 
The US government made the American people think it would be a quick and easy victory. 
But it is not that simple. 

It is a difficult decision to make. 
I was thinking about this during the 2004 presidential election. 
One of my reasons for voting for George Bush was to finish what he started. 
But now it's hard to leave Iraq. 
We took away their government and way of life. 
We should try to finish the job, but we must also think about the American casualties. 
Is it worth it to keep risking American lives for a free Iraq? 
The reason we invaded Iraq was to make it a democracy. 
But we don't do this to all countries. 
The main reason is the oil. 
We want the oil. 
Another reason was that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but we didn't find any. 
We know North Korea has these weapons, but we are not attacking them. 
I don't think the US government is honest in its decisions. 

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq. 
But I don't think it will be easy.

I support gay marriage. I have always believed in it. I think it is a personal preference. Many studies show that being gay may be a natural part of a person's biology, not something they choose. This makes it unfair to deny them equal rights. I think it is inhumane to treat people unfairly because of something they cannot control.

I do not think the government should decide who can get married. Marriage is a personal choice, not something for the government to decide. It is not just a state issue, but a personal issue. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married because they are not allowed to. But they live like any other family: they walk their dogs and go about their daily lives.

I think it is wrong for the government to try to decide what marriage means. It is like trying to play God. I do not think it is right to deny people their rights because of who they love.

Many studies show that being gay may be caused by a chemical in the brain. It is not something a person chooses, but something they are born with. For example, a person may be gay even if they grow up with sisters and no father. This shows that being gay is not a choice.

The only reason I can think of for not allowing gay marriage is that it is a public issue. But if a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it privately. But if two gay people want to get married, it becomes a public issue. I think marriage should be a private matter, not something for the government to decide.

I do not think anyone should be denied the right to get married because of who they love. I support gay marriage.

When you put something on the internet, it becomes public. Everyone can see it. It is not private. As an R.A., I have dealt with this situation before. 

If you put something on the internet, it can affect how people think of you. If you talk about violence or shootings, someone might take it seriously. You should not put that kind of information on the internet. It goes to the whole world. If you are friends with that person on social media, you might see it. 

The school cannot ignore something that appears to be a threat. They have to take action to keep everyone safe. They can't just let it sit there in case something bad happens. 

But it is hard to know what is real and what is just a joke. Some people might say things on the internet just to be funny. This happened at my school when someone overheard something and called the school. They looked at the person's Facebook and found some things that made them worry. 

When you put things on the internet, you can't control who sees them. If you don't want people to know something, don't put it online. You can't tell people what to think or take seriously. 

School officials should not be friends with students on social media. But if something is brought to their attention, they have to take it seriously. They can't monitor private conversations, but if it's brought to their attention, they have to act. 

It's the same thing if a teacher makes a fake account to friend students. They should not do that. I wouldn't friend my residents on social media because I don't want to see things that might get them in trouble.

I think the war has lasted too long. 
The original goal was good. We wanted to bring democracy to another country. 
But now, I think we have lost sight of that goal. 
We are not fighting for democracy anymore. 
We are fighting just to show we are powerful. 
This is not a good reason for war. 

The war started with a good purpose. We wanted to give democracy to a country without a fair government. 
That is a good reason for war. 
But over time, our reasons have changed. 
We are now fighting just to keep fighting. 
We do not want to leave without winning. 

The war has lasted for too long. 
It is time for the country to take care of its own government. 
We should stop the war and spend our money on our own problems. 
We have many problems in our own country, like poverty and bad roads. 
We should spend our money on these problems, not on war. 

We are spending billions of dollars on war. 
War should not be a long-term cost. 
We should spend our money on things like health care and schools. 
Now, we are spending money to hurt our own soldiers in a war we are losing. 

I think that is all I want to say.

I have a question. It was stopped because someone found the information online. They looked at a site called Myspace. If you put information on the internet, it's available for everyone to see. On Myspace, you have to be a member to see someone's profile. But if you accept someone as your "friend," they can see your information. So, you give them permission.

It's hard to know who can see your information, but when you put it on the internet, many people can see it. In my case, I think it's good that someone found the information. It helped prevent a life from being lost.

It's not fair to have one person check everyone's profiles all the time, but then it's unfair to only look at the bad kids. If someone is looking for information to prevent something bad from happening, it's okay. But if they're just looking for trouble, it's not right.

I don't have a Myspace, but I have a Facebook. I'm worried about people seeing things about me. There was a TV show about a man who got information easily. He got a girl's screen name and talked to her on instant messenger. It's not safe.

People can learn a lot about you from your Facebook or Myspace. They can see your photos, your classes, and your friends. I tried to limit what I put up, but it's hard. I want to stay in touch with my friends.

It's a tricky issue because you never know who can see your information. My roommate told me about a school that banned students from having Myspace. I'm not sure if that's right. How can school officials tell students what to do on the internet?

I want to talk about the Iraq War. It is a very complex issue. I feel like I am being hypocritical if I say certain things. I was against the war from the beginning, but now it's not as important as it used to be. Almost everyone agrees that it was a bad idea, except for the people in the administration.

We see this in polls from the United States, Iraq, and around the world. About 75 to 80 percent of the world's population thinks the war was a bad idea. 80 percent of Iraqi people and 70 percent of US troops think it was a bad idea and that we should leave within a year.

The war was a disaster from the start. Now, leaving will also be difficult. The problem is that there is a big cultural difference between the US and the Middle East. We want to bring democracy to Iraq, but it's not the right system for them. They might not want it.

We should think about the pros and cons before invading a country. We need to consider the problems that come with staying in Iraq. I don't agree with the administration's ideas for staying. I haven't heard a good reason to stay.

If we want to leave gradually, that's okay. But I don't see a reason to stay any longer than necessary. I read that 80 percent of Iraqis want us to leave within a year, and a quarter want us to leave now. If we ask them, they might know better than us.

If we leave and something goes wrong, we can say we were going to stay, but they wanted us to leave. If we leave now, we can help them later as the good guys. We'll be better off than where we are now.

I think gender discrimination is still an issue in the United States. It's not just about women, though. I think it also depends on the job you do. For example, women often have it harder because there's the idea of a "glass ceiling" where people may not want to work for a woman, even if she has the qualifications for a job. This is because of the way society has been for a long time. In many workplaces, women are not often in top positions. It's hard for women to get jobs that they're qualified for because of this.

It's not just women who face this problem, though. Men can too. For example, in the fashion industry, people may not take men seriously if they like fashion. They may think, "How can you know what fashion is if you're a man?" This is because men who like fashion are often expected to have a certain style, and if they don't fit that style, people may doubt their ability to understand fashion.

It's the same with men who stay at home to be with their children. People may look down on them because they think men should be the main breadwinners. But some men may want to be with their children and take care of them. It's not a big deal if the wife has a better-paying job. 

So, it's not just about gender. It's also about the kind of job you do and where you come from. For example, a person from a farm may not speak perfect English, but they may be very smart and able to run a company. However, other people may still judge them because of the way they speak.

It's hard to change these attitudes, but we're making progress. Women are becoming more accepted in business, and men are starting to stay at home to care for their children. This is good, but it's a slow process. We need to keep promoting equality and fairness so that everyone has a chance to succeed, no matter what their background is.

My understanding is that marijuana was not made legal. It was decriminalized. This means it is no longer a serious crime. Instead, people can be given a ticket, like a traffic ticket, and they do not have to be arrested and put in jail.

If someone is caught with marijuana and gets a ticket, this can affect their future. They may have trouble getting a job or in school. These problems do not go away just because marijuana is not a crime.

However, some people say it is expensive to arrest and jail people. It costs money to take them to court and to pay for a lawyer. This can be a problem for cities that do not have a lot of money. In some cities, people do not want to make marijuana not a crime, even if it would save them money.

But in some places, like Denver, people are more open-minded. They think it is a good idea to make marijuana not a crime. This can help the city have more money to spend on important things, like education and helping the homeless.

But there are also reasons why marijuana should not be everywhere. For example, it can be bad for driving and it is still not widely accepted in many places. If it were legal everywhere, it might seem strange to see people smoking it in public.

I am not sure how I would feel if marijuana were completely legal. Some people might think it would be okay to sell it in stores like cigarettes. But this could also mean that more people would drive and smoke it, which could be a problem. Many people still think it is wrong to smoke marijuana in public.

In general, I think marijuana can have bad effects on people's lives, not just their ability to drive. But people react differently to different substances, and some people are better at controlling how they use them.

So, it is hard to say how marijuana should be treated. I do think that both marijuana and alcohol can have bad effects.

I agree. 

Why? 

Many of the Catholic Church's practices are traditional. They have done things in the same way for a long time. It is good to respect tradition. But it is also important to be able to change.

Some Catholics believe they must go to church every week. They have strict rules about how things are done. Sometimes, I think the Catholic Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules exactly. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my parents are from different religions. My father is Episcopalian. My mother is Catholic. They could not get married in the Catholic Church because of my father's religion.

This is not being tolerant of other religions. We learn to love others in Catholic school. But it is hypocritical to say we love others and then not accept them.

I do not think allowing priests to marry would solve the problem of child abuse. People who abuse children will probably continue to do so, even if they are married. This is because they are hurting a child, not a spouse.

So, I do not think allowing priests to marry would be a good solution.

I am not sure about this issue. I have not thought about it deeply. I do not know if one side is right or wrong. 

This is a very difficult topic. We must be careful not to offend people. 

The idea of marriage is very important. But we also want to keep the church and government separate. It is hard to decide what marriage means without hurting anyone's feelings. 

I think marriage should be a civil union. Many people get tax breaks and special treatment if they are married. But we should not look at the kind of marriage it is. We should just know that two people are together. 

The idea of gay marriage is the same. Two people are together, and they should have the same rights. 

If many states agree, they should make it a federal law. But a constitutional amendment to ban gay marriage is not right. The constitution should not be changed for one big issue. It is not important enough. 

We should not change the constitution just to ban gay marriage. It is simple. 

No.

I grew up in a Christian home. For me, homosexuality is a complicated issue. I have many gay friends. I don't agree with all of their choices. But I think they should have the same rights as others. I don't think the president should decide for the whole country. Each state should decide for itself.

I believe that in democratic states, people usually support gay marriage. If you live in a state where they support it, you should respect their decision. You chose to live there, so you should accept their views.

I think homosexuals should have the same opportunities as others. So, each state should decide whether to make gay marriage legal or not.

I already answered this question. I don't think the president should make a decision for the whole country. I don't agree with President Bush's plan to ban gay marriage. He should not decide how each state should be run.

I think some things should be decided by individual states. The president will leave office soon. If a new president decides to change the law, it will just go back and forth. It's best to let each state decide for itself because they will live with the decision, not the president.

No, I don't think so.

The school system has the right to check student's Myspace pages. These pages are public, and students can post anything they want. School officials can see what students post, even if it's not under the school's name. They can still see it from their homes.

Schools have a responsibility to keep students safe. If they check Myspace to find students who are breaking the rules, that's okay. It helps keep the school safe. I think that's good.

Some people might think it's an invasion of privacy. But if it helps keep students safe, I don't think that's a bad thing. It's like when schools have lockdowns to keep students safe from danger. They are just trying to keep the school a safe place.

Students should know that anything they post online can be seen by others. They can't control who sees it. If they post something bad, they might get in trouble. This is why some students are careful about what they post online.

School officials are just trying to keep the school a safe place. They are not trying to be mean or hurt students. They just want to keep students safe from potential problems like school shootings.

This is why I think it's okay for school officials to check Myspace. They are just trying to help keep students safe.

I am not sure about the war.  At first, I thought it was a good idea.  I was affected by 9/11.  I wanted to go and help.  But I think we made a mistake.  We did not think about the future.  We went without a plan.  And then things did not go well.

I was for the war, but now I am against it.  I do not think it helped.  The people in the country we went to are fighting each other.  They cannot fight us if they are fighting themselves.  We went there because of 9/11.  But I do not care what happens to them now.

Sometimes I do not think they are human.  They fight a lot and cannot get along.  We did not know what to expect when we went there.  War is different for them than for us.  They are different in how they fight.  I do not think they want to make their country better.  They just want us to leave.

I think we were not thinking clearly.  We were angry and wanted revenge.  We wanted to change their way of life.  But we did not think about the consequences.  We just went there and wanted to leave quickly.

I think President Bush declared war on Iraq because people wanted to go to war.  He did not have a good plan.  We could not just let Iraq do bad things and then decide to rebuild.  But we could have had a better plan.

We did not have unity.  We did not know what we were doing.  That would have helped us.  We went to war with anger and emotion.  That is what we created in Iraq.

I do not think we can change those people.  They will always be like that.  We cannot stay in Iraq forever.  Once we leave, things will collapse.  We are hurting ourselves by staying.
